Menu.name: Biryani
Menu.description: A rice dish cooked with spices, meat, vegetables, and yogurt.

Menu.name: Masala dosa
Menu.description: A thin crepe made from fermented rice and lentil batter, filled with a potato and onion mixture and served with chutneys and sambar.

Menu.name: Butter chicken
Menu.description: A dish of chicken cooked in a creamy tomato sauce flavored with butter and spices.

Menu.name: Samosas
Menu.description: Deep-fried pastries filled with a savory potato and pea mixture, often served with chutneys.

Menu.name: Naan
Menu.description: A leavened flatbread cooked in a tandoor oven.

Menu.name: Tandoori chicken
Menu.description: Chicken marinated in yogurt and spices and cooked in a tandoor oven.

Menu.name: Palak paneer
Menu.description: A dish of paneer cheese cooked in a spinach sauce.

Menu.name: Chana masala
Menu.description: A dish of chickpeas cooked in a tomato and onion sauce.

Menu.name: Dal makhani
Menu.description: A lentil dish cooked in a creamy tomato sauce.

Menu.name: Idli
Menu.description: Steamed cakes made from fermented rice and lentil batter.

Menu.name: Vada
Menu.description: Deep-fried savory donuts made from lentil batter.

Menu.name: Dhokla
Menu.description: Steamed cakes made from fermented chickpea batter.

Menu.name: Uttapam
Menu.description: A thick pancake made from fermented rice and lentil batter, often topped with vegetables and spices.

Menu.name: Chaat
Menu.description: A savory snack made with a variety of ingredients, such as potatoes, chickpeas, yogurt, tamarind chutney, and spices.

Menu.name: Rasmalai
Menu.description: Balls of paneer cheese soaked in a sweet milk syrup.

Menu.name: Gulab jamun
Menu.description: Milk solids deep-fried in syrup and then soaked in sugar syrup.

Menu.name: Jalebi
Menu.description: Deep-fried batter spirals soaked in sugar syrup.

Menu.name: Ladoo
Menu.description: Sweet balls made with various ingredients, such as gram flour, sugar, and nuts.

Menu.name: Barfi
Menu.description: A dense, fudge-like sweet made with milk, sugar, and nuts.

Menu.name: Gajar ka halwa
Menu.description: A carrot pudding dessert made with carrots, milk, sugar, and nuts.

Menu.name: Kheer
Menu.description: A rice pudding dessert made with milk, sugar, and rice.

Menu.name: Payasam
Menu.description: A sweet milk porridge made with milk, sugar, and rice or vermicelli.

Menu.name: Falooda
Menu.description: A cold dessert made with milk, sugar, ice cream, vermicelli, and nuts.

Menu.name: Thali
Menu.description: A platter of various Indian dishes, such as rice, dal, curry, vegetables, and roti.

Menu.name: Dosa
Menu.description: A thin crepe made from fermented rice and lentil batter, often filled with a potato and onion mixture or other savory fillings.
